snippet.title: Adhvan Chakra Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Adhvan Chakra is a 2D real-time tactical game featuring extraction mechanics, RPG unit progression and base management systems.

Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.

Available 2025.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3290180/Adhvan_Chakra/?beta=0
